item.dc:creator: Surviving Nairobi
item.description: We are finally having a live show. Come join us as we record a live episode for the first time and just vibe and hang out, we promise it will be. The live show will be at Cheche Bookshop and Cafe in Lavington, Nairobi. Tickets are 500 bob and are very limited due to MOH guidelines so get yours as soon as you can. You can get tickets via messaging our socials ( @survivingnairobi on IG and @survivenairobi on twitter) or by calling/texting 0742509392. Thanks for all the support and we look forward to seeing you guys
